description: Erection of side dormer roof extension, installation of 3x roof lights, following removal of existing chimney
decision_conditions: The proposed side dormer extension by virtue of its size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the host property that would unbalance the pair of semi-detached properties it forms part of and would be visually intrusive in the streetscene to the detriment of the character and appearance of the pair of semi-detached properties and streetscene. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
Please provide previously approved plans to accompany your current application

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:The removal of small dead trees overhanging the public footpath and technically exempt from application.Recommendation:Approve.
